Our Finance Finders Division is recruiting for this exciting opportunity - spread the word!
Our team just received a search assignment for an Enterprise Architect to work within a large, industry-leading enterprise in the Phoenix area. If you'd like to learn more about it, let me know!

"Talking Nerdy Since 1998"Specialists in local Arizona talent.Tech Finders is a 19 year old Scottsdale based, technical recruiting company. We specialize in finding hidden talent in the areas of Technical Management, Software / Web Development, Database Administration, SEO, Data Storage, Network Security, as well as other areas within Information Technology.  Specialties: .Net Developers, Java Developers, PHP, IT Sales, Unix / Windows Systems Administrators, Big Data, Network Engineers, Tech Support/Help Desk, Web Designers & Developers, Creative Marketing, Security, and IT Leadership.Our HR Division, HR Finders, assists in finding HR expertise in the areas of: Talent Acquisition, Benefits, Compensation, HR Executive Management, Recruitment, and Training.  Please think of us the next time you need an HR expert for a project, contract or direct hire need. www.hr-finders.com Our Accounting and Finance Division, Finance Finders, assists in finding a powerful network of finance and accounting professionals in the areas of:  Leadership, Analysts, Operations, Accountants, and Controllers. Whether you are looking for contract or direct hire professionals in this discipline, we will work with you to design an approach that works.Services: Full life-cycle recruiting, recruiting services on a contract or direct hire basisAwards:Named One of the Best Companies to Work for in AZ – 2016 Phoenix Business Journal Top Woman Owned Company in AZ - Business Journal 2016 (#40)One of the Most Influential Woman Award - AZ Business 2016Inc. 5000 Award Recipient for 2015 - #1660 fastest growing company in the USInc. 5000 Award - #8 Fastest Growing Private Company in Phoenix 2014Inc. 5000 Award Recipient for 2014 - #1626 fastest growing company in the USRanking Arizona - 2014 & 2013 #1 Technical Recruiting FirmWho's Who In Business 2013 - 50 Highest Ranked Women in AZWho's Who in Business - Top 10 Employment Services 2010, Top 10 Tech Placement Company 2009

summary: Executive Recruiter with substantial experience directly sourcing talent for a variety of functional skill sets and industry verticals including: Retail, Pharmaceutical, Information Technology, Education, Human Resources, Finance/Banking, and Mortgage – just to name a few. My placement transactions include highly sought after executives, managers, and high-potential professionals for Fortune 50, middle-market and growth stage companies. In my placement practice, I provide a consultative, relationship-driven experience for both candidates and client firms. My company offers industry best practices in service, talent acquisition and have become a leading source for delivering consistent, recruitment excellence. I can be reached at kerri@aztechfinders.com.Specialties: Executive search
